title: What An Actor (Part 1)
body:
What An Actor (Part 1)

"Have you ever wondered why that guy taught you the method of summoning the demons?"

Hearing what Evan said, Sera hesitated for a few seconds but after seeing the mocking look on his face she finally said, "Because he wants us to kill as many humans as possible."

"And why does he want you to kill as many humans as possible?" Evan asked in a calm voice.

Sera looked at him for a few seconds before speaking.
